title: Spy x Family
quotes: World peace is an ideal, but protecting my family is my reality.
The world might not care about you, but your family does.
Sometimes a lie told out of kindness can save a person.
For my family, I will walk through fire and water.
I've always been alone, but having a family might not be so bad.
If you want to make friends, you need to get into their hearts.
You are exactly where you need to be.

Can't help but feel that she chose us. Not the other way around.
Spies must remain in the shadows, that's the iron law.
